field.condition: <> '-1' and tblGoods.classCode in (Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=0 and (GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' ) union Select g.classCode from tblGoods g , ( Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=1 and GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+?+'%' ) c where g.classcode like c.classcode+'%' and g.isCatalog=0)

<> '-1' and tblGoods.classCode in (Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=0 and (GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') union Select g.classCode from tblGoods g , ( Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=1 and GoodsFullName like '%'+?+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') c where g.classcode like c.classcode+'%' and g.isCatalog=0)

<> '-1' and tblGoods.classCode in (Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=0 and (GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') union Select g.classCode from tblGoods g , ( Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=1 and GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+?+'%') c where g.classcode like c.classcode+'%' and g.isCatalog=0)

SQL.text: select vbCrLf tblBeginStock.BillDate as BillDate,vbCrLf tblBeginStock.BillNo as BillNo,vbCrLf tblGoods.GoodsNumber as GoodsNumber,vbCrLf tblGoods.GoodsFullName as GoodsFullName,vbCrLf tblGoods.GoodsSpec as GoodsSpec,vbCrLf tblBeginStock.TotalTaxAmount as TotalTaxAmount,vbCrLf tblBeginStock.CurTotalAmount as CurTotalAmount,vbCrLf tblStock.StockFullName as StockFullName,vbCrLf tblEmployee1.EmpFullName as EmpFullName,vbCrLf tblDepartment.DeptFullName as DeptFullName,vbCrLf tblEmployee2.EmpFullName as EmpFullName2,vbCrLf tblBeginStock.id as id,vbCrLf tblBeginStock.Remark as RemarkvbCrLffrom tblBeginStock vbCrLfleft join tblBeginStockDet on (tblBeginStock.id=tblBeginStockDet.f_ref and tblBeginStockDet.id=(select top 1 a.id from tblBeginStockDet a where a.f_ref=tblBeginStock.id and a.GoodsCode in (select classCode from tblGoods where (GoodsNumber <> '-1' and tblGoods.classCode in (Select classCode from tblGoods where isCatalog=0 and (GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' ) union Select g.classCode from tblGoods g , ( Select classCode from tblGoods where isCatalog=1 and GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' ) c where g.classcode like c.classcode+'%' and g.isCatalog=0)) and (GoodsFullName <> '-1' and tblGoods.classCode in (Select classCode from tblGoods where isCatalog=0 and (GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') union Select g.classCode from tblGoods g , ( Select classCode from tblGoods where isCatalog=1 and GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') c where g.classcode like c.classcode+'%' and g.isCatalog=0)) and (GoodsSpec <> '-1' and tblGoods.classCode in (Select classCode from tblGoods where isCatalog=0 and (GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') union Select g.classCode from tblGoods g , ( Select classCode from tblGoods where isCatalog=1 and GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') c where g.classcode like c.classcode+'%' and g.isCatalog=0)))@condsent_StockFullName:[ and (StockCode in (select classCode from tblStock where StockFullName like '%'+@condition:StockFullName+'%') or tblBeginStock.StockCode in (select classCode from tblStock where StockFullName like '%'+@condition:StockFullName+'%'))]))vbCrLfleft join tblGoods on tblGoods.classCode=tblBeginStockDet.GoodsCodevbCrLf left join tblDepartment on tblDepartment.classCode=tblBeginStock.DepartmentCodevbCrLf left join tblEmployee tblEmployee1 on tblEmployee1.id=tblBeginStock.EmployeeID vbCrLf left join tblEmployee tblEmployee2 on tblEmployee2.id=tblBeginStock.createByvbCrLf left join tblStock on tblStock.classCode=tblBeginStock.StockCodevbCrLfwhere 1=1 vbCrLf and (tblBeginStock.BillDate >= ?)vbCrLf and (tblBeginStock.BillDate <= ?)vbCrLf and (tblBeginStock.BillNo like '%'+?+'%')vbCrLf and (tblGoods.GoodsNumber <> '-1' and tblGoods.classCode in (Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=0 and (GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' ) union Select g.classCode from tblGoods g , ( Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=1 and GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+?+'%' ) c where g.classcode like c.classcode+'%' and g.isCatalog=0))vbCrLf and (tblGoods.GoodsFullName <> '-1' and tblGoods.classCode in (Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=0 and (GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') union Select g.classCode from tblGoods g , ( Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=1 and GoodsFullName like '%'+?+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') c where g.classcode like c.classcode+'%' and g.isCatalog=0))vbCrLf and (tblGoods.GoodsSpec <> '-1' and tblGoods.classCode in (Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=0 and (GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+@condition:GoodsSpec+'%') union Select g.classCode from tblGoods g , ( Select classCode from tblGoods where 1=1 and isCatalog=1 and GoodsFullName like '%'+@condition:GoodsFullName+'%' and GoodsNumber like '%'+@condition:GoodsNumber+'%' and GoodsSpec like '%'+?+'%') c where g.classcode like c.classcode+'%' and g.isCatalog=0))vbCrLf and (tblStock.StockFullName like '%'+?+'%')vbCrLf and (tblEmployee1.EmpFullName like '%'+?+'%')vbCrLf and (tblDepartment.DeptFullName like '%'+?+'%')vbCrLf and (tblBeginStock.Remark like '%'+?+'%')vbCrLfvbCrLforder by vbCrLf tblBeginStock.BillDate desc,vbCrLf tblBeginStock.BillNo descvbCrLfvbCrLf
